entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
